title: Any eBook Converter 1.0.7 Multilingual + Medicine[BabuPC]
description: Any eBook Converter is a powerful and professional eBook Converter to remove DRM from eBooks files, including Kindle eBooks, Adobe eBooks, Barnes Noble NOOK eBooks and Kobo eBooks. After removing DRM, you can read your purchases on any of your e-readers or apps that you want. Currently, Any eBook Converter supports adding up to 24 file format for converting, such as Kindle, Adobe, PRC, HTMLZ, DOCX, etc. Convert eBooks to DRM-Free EPUB, PDF, Mobi, AZW, Text Thanks to the top-leading DRM decrypting technique, Any eBook Converter is capable of converting most of eBooks files to DRM-free ePub, PDF, Mobi, AZW, Text format with only 4 steps. Besides that, It provides the user-friendly interface and functions, allowing the software to automatically scan the entire eBook library, then you can use one-click to import all the eBooks. Edit Ebook Metadata Information (Title, Author, Publisher…) Want to convert eBooks from Kindle, Adobe, NOOK and Kobo but worry about missing some important stuff after converting your eBooks? Don’t worry. Any eBook Converter, which is the most easy-to-use Windows eBook converter, helps you directly edit all the necessary metadate information, such as title, author, publisher, data, identifiers, language, etc. Support Batch Conversion Any eBook Converter is the best eBook DRM Remover to decrypt and convert eBooks purchased from Kindle, Adobe, Kobo and Nook eBook stores in batch with 1-click, which would save lots of time. After conversion, user can read these eBook files on iPad, NOOK, Kobo eReader, Sony Reader or other e-reader devices without any limitation. http://babupc.com.html
